title: Ep. 224 - Democrats In Mourning
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, the Left is in mourning as Mueller finds no evidence for collusion. But what does It say about the Left that they’re upset the President DIDN'T collude? And what does it say about our media that they pushed this conspiracy theory for two years? Nothing good, that’s for sure. Also, Kamala Harris says all teachers need a raise. Is she right?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
